#summary About how to setup Mine DS on your Nintendo DS
= Introduction =

Although this is self explanatory for most people, below lists the steps needed to run Mine DS on your DS.


= Details =

1. Make sure you have a working flashcard for your DS (If you don't, buy any one for your system). Link: http://goo.gl/NsTaM

2. Make sure you have a micro SD card and a reader.
3. Connect your SD card to the computer.

4. Download Mine DS .nds file.

5. Copy the downloaded file to your SD card.

6. Take it out and place in your flashcard.

7. When booted up, select Mine DS.
Done.
